0.text: Innate - Echo: Seraphine basic abilities generate a stack of Echo, stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, Seraphine's next basic ability casts an additional time at no cost after a 0.033 seconds delay, consuming all Echo stacks after the cast time of the second cast completes.Seraphine gains maximum stacks of Echo when the game starts and upon respawning.

1.text: Innate - Harmony: Seraphine's abilities grant a Note to her and all nearby allied  champions. Notes last 6 seconds and up to 4 of them can be active on each unit at a time. The duration of Notes refreshes on Seraphine's subsequent ability casts while the holder is within Harmony's aura or is hit by  Encore.

2.text: Seraphine's basic attacks while any amount of Notes are active for either her or allies have an  uncancelable windup and gain  25 bonus attack range per Note and fire all of them at the target, each one dealing 4 / 8 / 14 / 24 (based on level) (+ 6 / 7 / 8 / 9% (based on level) AP) magic damage upon arrival, reduced by 75% for Notes from allies and increased by 200% against  minions.

0.text: Active: Seraphine hurls a soundwave to the target location that quickly expands in a radius upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area, increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health).

1.text: High Note will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Seraphine empowers herself and nearby allied  champions with her music. She grants herself 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP)  decaying bonus movement speed and a 75 − 225 (based on level) (+ 45% AP)  shield for 2.5 seconds. Allies are granted 8% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed and a 50 − 150 (based on level) (+ 30% AP)  shield for 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Surround Sound will also  heal Seraphine and all nearby allied champions for 5% (+ 1.125% per 100 AP) of missing health per ally after its effect ends if Seraphine already had a  shield at the time of cast.

2.text: Surround Sound's effects can stack up to 2 times.

0.text: Active: Seraphine fires a heavy soundwave in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and  slowing them by 99% for 1 second.

1.text: Enemies that are already  slowed are also  rooted for the same duration.

2.text: Enemies that are  immobilized or  grounded are also  stunned for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Seraphine projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies struck in its path and  charms them for a few seconds, during which they are also  revealed and  slowed by 40%, increasing by 15% every 0.25 seconds over the duration, up to 99%.

1.text: Encore's projectile resets its remaining travel distance whenever it strikes an allied or enemy  champion, excluding Seraphine. Additionally, all struck allied champions gain 4  Notes.
